BiomeDef.label: dagobah
BiomeDef.description: Dagobah is a planet in the Dagobah system, and one of the purest places in the galaxy within the Force. A remote world of swamps and forests. [Ocean]

BiomeDef.label: dagobah
BiomeDef.description: Dagobah is a planet in the Dagobah system, and one of the purest places in the galaxy within the Force. A remote world of swamps and forests. [Lake]
